tool_description: Our currency exchange API offers real-time access to exchange rates for 160 currencies, exclusively focusing on foreign exchange information. This robust service updates every 60 seconds, ensuring you have the most current data at your fingertips. Designed for efficiency and reliability, our API is the perfect solution for developers looking to integrate currency conversion features into their applications, financial platforms, or business processes. With a straightforward implementation proc...

api_list.name: getAllCurrencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-converter-exchange-rates-foreign-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-converter-exchange-rates-foreign-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
